languages.text: {n}Серый Вортен с упоением внимает словам господина, и в его налитых кровью глазах разгорается все более жгучее пламя — неестественное, пугающее, демоническое.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Серый Вортен с упоением внимает словам господина, и в его налитых кровью глазах разгорается все более жгучее пламя — неестественное, пугающее, демоническое.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Worten the Grey seems hypnotised by his master's words, his bloodshot eyes alight with a slowly growing flame — unnatural, frightening, daemonic.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Серый Вортен с упоением внимает словам господина, и в его налитых кровью глазах разгорается все более жгучее пламя — неестественное, пугающее, демоническое.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Worten the Grey listens to the words of his master enthusiastically, and in his bloodshot eyes burns the ever-growing flame — unnatural, frightening, demonic.{/n}
{n}Worten the Grey listens to the words of his master enthusiastically, and in his bloodshot eyes burns the ever-growing flame — unnatural, frightening, demonic.{/n}
{n}Worten the Grey listens to the words of his master enthusiastically, and in his bloodshot eyes burns the ever-growing flame — unnatural, frightening, demonic.{/n}

{n}Worten the Grey seems hypnotised by his master's words, his bloodshot eyes alight with a slowly growing flame — unnatural, frightening, daemonic.{/n}
{n}Worten the Grey seems hypnotised by his master's words, his bloodshot eyes alight with a slowly growing flame — unnatural, frightening, daemonic.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Worten el Gris parece hipnotizado por las palabras de su amo y en sus ojos, inyectados en sangre, arde un fuego cada vez más intenso. Un fuego antinatural, aterrador y daemónico.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey seems hypnotised by his master's words, his bloodshot eyes alight with a slowly growing flame — unnatural, frightening, daemonic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Worten el Gris escucha las palabras de su amo con entusiasmo, y en sus ojos inyectados en sangre arde el fuego abrasador de algo antinatural, terrorífico y demoníaco.{/n}

languages.text: {n}灰斑沃尔腾似乎被他主人的话催眠了一样。他布满血丝的双眼中闪烁着扭曲而恐怖的烈焰，如同恶魔一般。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey seems hypnotised by his master's words, his bloodshot eyes alight with a slowly growing flame — unnatural, frightening, daemonic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}灰斑沃尔腾热情地听着他主人的话。他布满血丝的双眼中，扭曲而恐怖烈焰愈发明亮，如同恶魔一般。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Worten le Gris semble hypnotisé par les paroles de son maître. Dans ses yeux injectés de sang brûle une flamme de plus en plus intense qui lui donne un air surnaturel, effrayant et démoniaque.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey seems hypnotised by his master's words, his bloodshot eyes alight with a slowly growing flame — unnatural, frightening, daemonic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Worten le Gris semble hypnotisé par les paroles de son maître. Dans ses yeux injectés de sang brûle une flamme de plus en plus intense qui lui donne un air surnaturel, effrayant et démoniaque.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴォルテン・ザ・グレイは主の言葉に陶酔したかのように耳を傾ける。その血走った目には、不自然で、恐ろしく、まるで悪魔のような炎がごうごうと燃え盛っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey seems hypnotised by his master's words, his bloodshot eyes alight with a slowly growing flame — unnatural, frightening, daemonic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォルテン・ザ・グレイは主の言葉に陶酔したかのように耳を傾ける。その血走った目には、不自然で、恐ろしく、まるで悪魔のような炎がごうごうと燃え盛っている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Worten der Graue scheint von den Worten seines Meisters hypnotisiert zu sein. In seinen blutunterlaufenen Augen züngelt eine langsam wachsende Flamme ... unnatürlich, beängstigend, dämonisch.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey seems hypnotised by his master's words, his bloodshot eyes alight with a slowly growing flame — unnatural, frightening, daemonic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Worten der Graue lauscht begeistert den Worten seines Meisters, und in seinen blutunterlaufenen Augen brennt die stetig wachsende Flamme — unnatürlich, furchterregend, dämonisch.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gri Worten, efendisinin sözleri karşısında hipnotize olmuş gibi görünüyor. Kan çanağına dönmüş gözleri; gitgide büyüyen, duygusuz, ürkütücü ve uğursuz bir alevle aydınlanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey seems hypnotised by his master's words, his bloodshot eyes alight with a slowly growing flame — unnatural, frightening, daemonic.{/n}
